section.title: Vector drawables
section.para: Android 5.0 includes the possibility to define vector drawables, similar to svg files but with a limited scope. The following listing demonstrates its usage in the vectordrawable.xml file. Using vector drawables has the advantages that this drawables automatically scale to the density of the device.

Android 5.0 contains also the AnimatedVectorDrawable which allows to combine vector drawables with animations. See
for several examples.
Vector drawbles are also available for older platform via the support library as VectorDrawableCompat .
